post_title: FS (Updated listing) - Graded Titus Sov & OM, Chesbro, Griff, Mahern, Paskert
post_content:
For Sale (Reduced for a 3rd time and cards added, sold cards removed) - A nice grouping of T206 portraits, w/ some hall of famers.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.

T206 John Titus Sovereign 350 SGC 1 - $320 venmo or zelle, $330 if pp gs.

T206 John Titus Old Mill SGC 3 - $550 venmo or zelle, $570 if pp gs

T206 Jack Chesbro Portrait, SC 150/30 - PSA 2.5  $320 venmo no fee or $330 pp gs

T206 Clark Griffith Portrait, SC 150 Factory #649 1st District of NY overstrike - SGC 2  $165 venmo no fee or $171 pp gs.

T206 Al Mattern Portrait Piedmont 350 - SGC 5  $260 venmo or zelle, $270 if pp gs.

T206 Dode Paskert Sovereign 350 - SGC 5  Sold
I'll take McGraw, thanks. Will PM
Bump for another reduction and addition of Titus', Paskert and Mahern.
